spell_tooltip.description: Summons a totem with 5% of your health at the target location for 6 sec that forms a circuit of electricity that enemies cannot pass through.
Healing Tide Totem's cooldown is reduced by 45 sec and it heals for 25% more each time it pulses.
Surging Totem is 50% more effective and costs 60% less mana.
Heals the friendly target for 351,046, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 353,800, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 358,066, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 420,591 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 429,757 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 425,770 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 291,713 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 119,912 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Lasts 1 hour.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.

Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.

Healing from Cloudburst Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 3% for 3 sec.
Purify Spirit additionally removes all Curse effects.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 16,095 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, Ancestral Protection, Earthen Wall, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.

Your Lava Burst and Riptide casts restore 2,625 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 39 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.8 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 386,200 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 374,035 and an additional 176,286 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 352,468 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.8 sec, healing all party or raid members within 52 yards for 205396.1.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge, Unleash Life, or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 13 yards by 15%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 937,179 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Healing Tide Totem now additionally grants 80% increased mana regeneration to allies.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.

Unleash elemental forces of Life, healing a friendly target for 380,224 and increasing the effect of your next healing spell.

Riptide, Healing Wave, or Healing Surge: 35% increased healing.

Chain Heal: 15% increased healing and bounces to 1 additional target.

Downpour: Affects 2 additional targets.

Wellspring: 40% of overhealing done is converted to an absorb effect.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.
Summons a totem at the target location with 7.9 million health for 18 sec. 33,935 damage from each attack against allies within 11.5 yards of the totem is redirected to the totem.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 227,211 over 9 sec.
Every 4 casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 18 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
Your haste is increased by 25% while Ascendance is active and its duration is increased by 3 sec.
Chain Heal's mana cost is reduced by 10% and Chain Heal increases the initial healing of your next Riptide by 75%, stacking up to 2 times.
Earth Shield and Water Shield no longer lose charges and are 115% effective.

Casting Surging Totem has a 100% chance to activate Downpour, allowing you to cast Downpour within 22 sec.

 Downpour
A burst of water at your Surging Totem's location heals up to 5 injured allies within 12 yards for 529,805 and increases their maximum health by 10% for 6 sec.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 18 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.

Chain Heal now jumps to a nearby totem within 26 yards once it reaches its last target, causing the totem to cast Chain Heal on an injured ally within 34 yards for 223,578. Jumps to 2 nearby targets within 26 yards.
Surging Totem heals for 150% more during Ascendance.
When you summon a Healing Tide Totem, Healing Stream Totem, Cloudburst Totem, Mana Tide Totem, or Spirit Link Totem you cast a free instant Chain Heal at 100% effectiveness.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 608,622 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

Your Healing Stream Totems now also heals a second ally at 50% effectiveness. 

Cloudburst Totem stores 25% additional healing.
Increases the duration of your Earthliving effect by 3 sec.

Learn a new weapon imbue, Tidecaller's Guard.

 Tidecaller's Guard
Imbue your shield with the element of Water for 1 hour. Your healing done is increased by 2.4% and the duration of your Healing Stream Totem and Cloudburst Totem is increased by 3.6 sec.
Chain Heals from Lively Totem and Totemic Rebound are 25% more effective.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Water: Your next Healing Wave or Healing Surge also heals an ally inside of your Healing Rain at 100% effectiveness.

Air: The cast time of your next healing spell is reduced by 40%.

Earth: Your next Chain Heal applies Earthliving at 150% effectiveness to all targets hit.
Heals the friendly target for 360,433, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 361,395, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 356,167, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 424,222 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 424,316 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 416,602 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 293,576 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 389,037 and an additional 176,286 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 362,702 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.
Deal 94,028 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.8 sec, healing all party or raid members within 52 yards for 211070.9.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain 10% increased health for 10 sec.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge, Unleash Life, or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 30%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 227,211 over 9 sec.

Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
Your haste is increased by 25% while Ascendance is active and its duration is increased by 3 sec.

When you heal with your Healing Wave, Healing Surge, or Riptide you have a 30% chance to summon an Ancestral spirit to aid you, instantly healing an injured friendly party or raid target within 40 yards for 50% of the amount healed. Critical strikes increase this chance to 60%.

Casting Surging Totem has a 100% chance to activate Downpour, allowing you to cast Downpour within 22 sec.

 Downpour

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 290,795 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 290,997 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.
Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 30% chance to trigger two extra attacks, dealing 9,336 Physical damage each.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 25,575 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Whenever you spend Maelstrom Weapon, your Frost Shock has a chance to become Ice Strike.

Ice Strike
Strike your target with an icy blade, dealing 91,326 Frost damage and snaring them by 50% for 6 sec.

Ice Strike increases the damage of your next Frost Shock by 100% and generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

This ability has a 40 yard range.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 23,295 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Shatters a line of earth in front of you with your main hand weapon, causing 68,066 Flamestrike damage and Incapacitating any enemy hit for 2 sec.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.
Consuming at least 2 stacks of Hailstorm, and each explosion from Fire Nova now also grants you 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 27,675 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 8,321 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.
Stormstrike has a 25% chance to strike the target an additional time for 40% of normal damage. This effect can chain off of itself.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.
Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 18 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.
Your Feral Spirits are now imbued with Fire, Frost, or Lightning, increasing your damage dealt with that element by 10%, but now only increase your Physical damage dealt by 10%.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 423,811 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 415,997 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 425,967 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 294,653 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 577,499 Nature damage.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of your target to tremble and break, dealing 289,650 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at your target.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Fire Elemental to rain destruction on your enemies for 20 sec. 

While the Fire Elemental is active, Flame Shock deals damage 
33% faster, and newly applied Flame Shocks last 100% longer.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake have a 25% chance to refund all Maelstrom spent.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature or Frost spell by 15%.
Casting Stormkeeper summons a powerful Lightning Elemental to fight by your side for 10 sec.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Reduces the cooldown of Flame Shock by 1.5 sec and Flame Shock deals damage 15% faster.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 18 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 18 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
When you cast Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake, gain Lava Surge and increase the damage of your next Lava Burst by 10%.
Flame Shock damage increases the damage of your next Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times.
